name: Kitty kate caring
description: Prepare yourself to encounter a wonderful kitty game where you actually get to know the routine of a fancy cat. There will be some steps you need to go through, but first, you must understand your catthat each one of them represents an importnat need of your kitty. The smiley face is for good, state of mind she might be into if you play interactive activities or if you have some sports expercise shower and the napping icon. All of them will be fulfilled once you go through each stop. In order to buy cothes, you will need money and you will gain some with your super farm. Cultivate fruits and vegetables to sell them. At the gym, you will have to keep Kitty Kate in a good shape, so you will help her out with the exercises. Don't forget to check her condition and if is necessary to be improved just cook at the icon that indicates what she need. After sport, she might need a refreshing nap and maybe something to eat, or even a shower, Next comes the dentist, which is a must and you hsve to take care of her teeth to be bright and healthy. Match an amazing hairstyle with her brand new cleaned teeth from the salon selection. Use youe imaginatiom and add accessories too. Also, you can increase her unique style with spme fresh bought clonthes. Go to the mall to find the perfect look that will help Kitty Kate to unleash her beauty.
